benign:
From: Alice <alice@example.com>
To: you@example.org
Subject: Meeting notes

Hi team,
Please find the attached meeting notes. Let me know if you have questions.
Best,
Alice
phish1:
From: PayPal <service@paypal-support.com>
To: you@example.org
Subject: Your account is limited - Verify now

Dear user,
Your PayPal account has been limited. Please verify your account immediately by clicking the link below:
http://198.51.100.25/verify-account

Failure to verify will result in account suspension.

Sincerely,
PayPal Security
phish2:
From: IT Support <it-support@university.edu>
To: student@example.edu
Subject: URGENT: Password Reset Required

Dear Student,
We detected unusual activity. Reset your password immediately: http://univ-secure-login.com/login

If you did not request this, contact support.

Regards,
IT Team
suspicious_attach:
From: Unknown <unknown@randomdomain.xyz>
To: you@example.org
Subject: Documents attached
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=abcd

--abcd
Content-Type: text/plain

Please see attached.

--abcd
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=invoice.exe
Content-Type: application/octet-stream

(attachment)
--abcd--
